document.full_text: the shuttle endeavour astronauts packed gear and prepared to leave the international space station on sunday, wrapping up a 12-day visit to complete construction of the u.s. side of the orbital outpost.
document.title: shuttle astronauts prepare to leave space station
lines_and_colors: the shuttle endeavour astronauts packed gear and prepared to leave the international space station on sunday, wrapping up a 12-day visit to complete construction of the u.s. side of the orbital outpost.
